    function GetEndpointsResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property endpoints
      * @type {EndpointDescription[]}
      */
    self.endpoints = [];
    if (options.endpoints) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.endpoints));
        self.endpoints = options.endpoints.map(function(e){ return new EndpointDescription(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);

    function UserTokenPolicy(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */

    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

      * @type {String}

    /**

    /**

      * @default  null

    function ApplicationDescription(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;

    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

module node-opcua.get_endpoints_service.ApplicationDescription.prototype

function node-opcua.get_endpoints_service.ApplicationDescription.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.applicationUri = decode_String(stream,options);
    this.productUri = decode_String(stream,options);
    this.applicationName.decode(stream,options);
    this.applicationType = decode_ApplicationType(stream,options);
    this.gatewayServerUri = decode_String(stream,options);
    this.discoveryProfileUri = decode_String(stream,options);
    this.discoveryUrls = decodeArray(stream, decode_String);
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

if (messageHeader.msgType === "ERR") {

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

function node-opcua.get_endpoints_service.ApplicationDescription.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_String(this.applicationUri,stream);
    encode_String(this.productUri,stream);
   this.applicationName.encode(stream,options);
    encode_ApplicationType(this.applicationType,stream);
    encode_String(this.gatewayServerUri,stream);
    encode_String(this.discoveryProfileUri,stream);
    encodeArray(this.discoveryUrls, stream, encode_String);
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

function node-opcua.get_endpoints_service.ApplicationDescription.prototype.setApplicationType (value)

  • description and source-code
    setApplicationType = function (value) {
   var coercedValue = _enumerations.ApplicationType.typedEnum.get(value);
   /* istanbul ignore next */
   if (coercedValue === undefined || coercedValue === null) {
      throw new Error("value cannot be coerced to ApplicationType: " + value);
   }
   this.applicationType = coercedValue;
}
  • example usage
    ...

  * @property applicationType
  * @type {ApplicationType}
  */
self.setApplicationType(initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.applicationType));

/**
  *
  * @property gatewayServerUri
  * @type {String}
  */
self.gatewayServerUri = initialize_field(schema.fields[4], options.gatewayServerUri);

 * @method encode

ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};
/**
...

module node-opcua.get_endpoints_service.GetEndpointsResponse

function node-opcua.get_endpoints_service.GetEndpointsResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function GetEndpointsResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property endpoints
      * @type {EndpointDescription[]}
      */
    self.endpoints = [];
    if (options.endpoints) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.endpoints));
        self.endpoints = options.endpoints.map(function(e){ return new EndpointDescription(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.get_endpoints_service.GetEndpointsResponse.prototype

function node-opcua.get_endpoints_service.GetEndpointsResponse.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.responseHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.endpoints = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new EndpointDescription();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

if (messageHeader.msgType === "ERR") {

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

function node-opcua.get_endpoints_service.GetEndpointsResponse.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.responseHeader.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.endpoints,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

module node-opcua.get_endpoints_service.UserTokenPolicy

function node-opcua.get_endpoints_service.UserTokenPolicy (options)

  • description and source-code
    function UserTokenPolicy(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property policyId
      * @type {String}
      */
    self.policyId = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.policyId);

    /**
      *
      * @property tokenType
      * @type {EnumUserIdentityTokenType}
      */
    self.setTokenType(initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.tokenType));

    /**
      *
      * @property issuedTokenType
      * @type {String}
      * @default  null
      */
    self.issuedTokenType = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.issuedTokenType);

    /**
      *
      * @property issuerEndpointUrl
      * @type {String}
      * @default  null
      */
    self.issuerEndpointUrl = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.issuerEndpointUrl);

    /**
      *
      * @property securityPolicyUri
      * @type {String}
      * @default  null
      */
    self.securityPolicyUri = initialize_field(schema.fields[4], options.securityPolicyUri);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

    n/a

function node-opcua.get_endpoints_service.UserTokenPolicy.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.policyId = decode_String(stream,options);
    this.tokenType = decode_EnumUserIdentityTokenType(stream,options);
    this.issuedTokenType = decode_String(stream,options);
    this.issuerEndpointUrl = decode_String(stream,options);
    this.securityPolicyUri = decode_String(stream,options);
}

function node-opcua.get_endpoints_service.UserTokenPolicy.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_String(this.policyId,stream);
    encode_EnumUserIdentityTokenType(this.tokenType,stream);
    encode_String(this.issuedTokenType,stream);
    encode_String(this.issuerEndpointUrl,stream);
    encode_String(this.securityPolicyUri,stream);
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

function node-opcua.get_endpoints_service.UserTokenPolicy.prototype.setTokenType (value)

  • description and source-code
    setTokenType = function (value) {
   var coercedValue = _enumerations.EnumUserIdentityTokenType.typedEnum.get(value);
   /* istanbul ignore next */
   if (coercedValue === undefined || coercedValue === null) {
      throw new Error("value cannot be coerced to EnumUserIdentityTokenType: " + value);
   }
   this.tokenType = coercedValue;
}
  • example usage
    ...
self.policyId = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.policyId);

/**
  *
  * @property tokenType
  * @type {EnumUserIdentityTokenType}
  */
self.setTokenType(initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.tokenType));

  *
  * @property issuedTokenType
  * @type {String}
  * @default  null
  */

function node-opcua.historizing_service.AggregateConfiguration (options)

  • description and source-code
    function AggregateConfiguration(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property useServerCapabilitiesDefaults
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.useServerCapabilitiesDefaults = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.useServerCapabilitiesDefaults);

    /**
      *
      * @property treatUncertainAsBad
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.treatUncertainAsBad = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.treatUncertainAsBad);

    /**
      *
      * @property percentDataBad
      * @type {Byte}
      */
    self.percentDataBad = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.percentDataBad);

    /**
      *
      * @property percentDataGood
      * @type {Byte}
      */
    self.percentDataGood = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.percentDataGood);

    /**
      *
      * @property useSlopedExtrapolation
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.useSlopedExtrapolation = initialize_field(schema.fields[4], options.useSlopedExtrapolation);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryModifiedData (options)

  • description and source-code
    function HistoryModifiedData(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * An array of values of history data for the Node. The size of the array depends on the requested data parameters.
      * @property dataValues
      * @type {DataValue[]}
      */
    self.dataValues = [];
    if (options.dataValues) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.dataValues));
        self.dataValues = options.dataValues.map(function(e){ return new DataValue(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property modificationInfos
      * @type {ModificationInfo[]}
      */
    self.modificationInfos = [];
    if (options.modificationInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.modificationInfos));
        self.modificationInfos = options.modificationInfos.map(function(e){ return new ModificationInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function HistoryReadRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      * Maximum age of the value to be read in milliseconds
      * @property historyReadDetails
      * @type {ExtensionObject}
      */
    self.historyReadDetails = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.historyReadDetails);

    /**
      * An enumeration that specifies the Timestamps to be returned for each requested Variable Value Attribute.
      * @property timestampsToReturn
      * @type {TimestampsToReturn}
      * @default  3
      */
    self.setTimestampsToReturn(initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.timestampsToReturn));

    /**
      *
      * @property releaseContinuationPoints
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.releaseContinuationPoints = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.releaseContinuationPoints);

    /**
      * List of Nodes and their Attributes to read. For each entry in this list, a StatusCode is returned, and if it indicates success
, the Attribute Value is also returned.
      * @property nodesToRead
      * @type {HistoryReadValueId[]}
      */
    self.nodesToRead = [];
    if (options.nodesToRead) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.nodesToRead));
        self.nodesToRead = options.nodesToRead.map(function(e){ return new HistoryReadValueId(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function HistoryReadResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {HistoryReadResult[]}
      */
    self.results = [];
    if (options.results) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.results));
        self.results = options.results.map(function(e){ return new HistoryReadResult(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

function node-opcua.historizing_service.ModificationInfo (options)

  • description and source-code
    function ModificationInfo(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * The name of the user that made the modification. Support for this field is optional. A null shall be returned if it is not
 defined.
      * @property username
      * @type {String}
      */
    self.username = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.username);

    /**
      *  The time the modification was made. Support for this field is optional. A null shall be returned if it is not defined.
      * @property modificationTime
      * @type {UtcTime}
      */
    self.modificationTime = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.modificationTime);

    /**
      *  The modification type for the item.
      * @property updateType
      * @type {HistoryUpdateType}
      */
    self.setUpdateType(initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.updateType));

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • example usage

function node-opcua.historizing_service.ReadRawModifiedDetails (options)

  • description and source-code
    function ReadRawModifiedDetails(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    HistoryReadDetails.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property isReadModified
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.isReadModified = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.isReadModified);

    /**
      *
      * @property startTime
      * @type {DateTime}
      */
    self.startTime = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.startTime);

    /**
      *
      * @property endTime
      * @type {DateTime}
      */
    self.endTime = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.endTime);

    /**
      *
      * @property numValuesPerNode
      * @type {UInt32}
      */
    self.numValuesPerNode = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.numValuesPerNode);

    /**
      *
      * @property returnBounds
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.returnBounds = initialize_field(schema.fields[4], options.returnBounds);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

module node-opcua.historizing_service.AggregateConfiguration

function node-opcua.historizing_service.AggregateConfiguration (options)

  • description and source-code
    function AggregateConfiguration(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property useServerCapabilitiesDefaults
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.useServerCapabilitiesDefaults = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.useServerCapabilitiesDefaults);

    /**
      *
      * @property treatUncertainAsBad
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.treatUncertainAsBad = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.treatUncertainAsBad);

    /**
      *
      * @property percentDataBad
      * @type {Byte}
      */
    self.percentDataBad = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.percentDataBad);

    /**
      *
      * @property percentDataGood
      * @type {Byte}
      */
    self.percentDataGood = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.percentDataGood);

    /**
      *
      * @property useSlopedExtrapolation
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.useSlopedExtrapolation = initialize_field(schema.fields[4], options.useSlopedExtrapolation);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

function node-opcua.historizing_service.AggregateConfiguration.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.useServerCapabilitiesDefaults = decode_Boolean(stream,options);
    this.treatUncertainAsBad = decode_Boolean(stream,options);
    this.percentDataBad = decode_Byte(stream,options);
    this.percentDataGood = decode_Byte(stream,options);
    this.useSlopedExtrapolation = decode_Boolean(stream,options);
}

if (messageHeader.msgType === "ERR") {

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));

function node-opcua.historizing_service.AggregateConfiguration.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_Boolean(this.useServerCapabilitiesDefaults,stream);
    encode_Boolean(this.treatUncertainAsBad,stream);
    encode_Byte(this.percentDataBad,stream);
    encode_Byte(this.percentDataGood,stream);
    encode_Boolean(this.useSlopedExtrapolation,stream);
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

module node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryData

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryData (options)

  • description and source-code
    function HistoryData(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property dataValues
      * @type {DataValue[]}
      */
    self.dataValues = [];
    if (options.dataValues) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.dataValues));
        self.dataValues = options.dataValues.map(function(e){ return new DataValue(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

    this.dataValues = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DataValue();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });

    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);

module node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryModifiedData

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryModifiedData (options)

  • description and source-code
    function HistoryModifiedData(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * An array of values of history data for the Node. The size of the array depends on the requested data parameters.
      * @property dataValues
      * @type {DataValue[]}
      */
    self.dataValues = [];
    if (options.dataValues) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.dataValues));
        self.dataValues = options.dataValues.map(function(e){ return new DataValue(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property modificationInfos
      * @type {ModificationInfo[]}
      */
    self.modificationInfos = [];
    if (options.modificationInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.modificationInfos));
        self.modificationInfos = options.modificationInfos.map(function(e){ return new ModificationInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryModifiedData.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.dataValues = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DataValue();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
    this.modificationInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new ModificationInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}

module node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadRequest

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function HistoryReadRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      * Maximum age of the value to be read in milliseconds
      * @property historyReadDetails
      * @type {ExtensionObject}
      */
    self.historyReadDetails = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.historyReadDetails);

    /**
      * An enumeration that specifies the Timestamps to be returned for each requested Variable Value Attribute.
      * @property timestampsToReturn
      * @type {TimestampsToReturn}
      * @default  3
      */
    self.setTimestampsToReturn(initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.timestampsToReturn));

    /**
      *
      * @property releaseContinuationPoints
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.releaseContinuationPoints = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.releaseContinuationPoints);

    /**
      * List of Nodes and their Attributes to read. For each entry in this list, a StatusCode is returned, and if it indicates success
, the Attribute Value is also returned.
      * @property nodesToRead
      * @type {HistoryReadValueId[]}
      */
    self.nodesToRead = [];
    if (options.nodesToRead) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.nodesToRead));
        self.nodesToRead = options.nodesToRead.map(function(e){ return new HistoryReadValueId(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadRequest.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadRequest.prototype

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadRequest.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.requestHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.historyReadDetails = decode_ExtensionObject(stream,options);
    this.timestampsToReturn = decode_TimestampsToReturn(stream,options);
    this.releaseContinuationPoints = decode_Boolean(stream,options);
    this.nodesToRead = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new HistoryReadValueId();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}

    err.decode(stream);

    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

    encode_Boolean(this.releaseContinuationPoints,stream);
    encodeArray(this.nodesToRead,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });

/**
...

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadRequest.prototype.setTimestampsToReturn (value)

  • description and source-code
    setTimestampsToReturn = function (value) {
   var coercedValue = _enumerations.TimestampsToReturn.typedEnum.get(value);
   /* istanbul ignore next */
   if (coercedValue === undefined || coercedValue === null) {
      throw new Error("value cannot be coerced to TimestampsToReturn: " + value);
   }
   this.timestampsToReturn = coercedValue;
}
  • example usage
    ...
self.subscriptionId = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.subscriptionId);

/**
  *
  * @property timestampsToReturn
  * @type {TimestampsToReturn}
  */
self.setTimestampsToReturn(initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.timestampsToReturn
));

/**
  *
  * @property itemsToCreate
  * @type {MonitoredItemCreateRequest[]}
  */
self.itemsToCreate = [];

module node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadResponse

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function HistoryReadResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {HistoryReadResult[]}
      */
    self.results = [];
    if (options.results) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.results));
        self.results = options.results.map(function(e){ return new HistoryReadResult(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadResponse.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadResponse.prototype

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadResponse.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.responseHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.results = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new HistoryReadResult();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
    this.diagnosticInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}

    err.decode(stream);

    console.log(hexDump(data));

    encodeArray(this.diagnosticInfos,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });

module node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadResult

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadResult (options)

  • description and source-code
    function HistoryReadResult(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property statusCode
      * @type {StatusCode}
      */
    self.statusCode = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.statusCode);

    /**
      *
      * @property continuationPoint
      * @type {ByteString}
      * @default  null
      */
    self.continuationPoint = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.continuationPoint);

    /**
      *
      * @property historyData
      * @type {ExtensionObject}
      */
    self.historyData = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.historyData);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    this.statusCode = decode_StatusCode(stream,options);
    this.continuationPoint = decode_ByteString(stream,options);
    this.historyData = decode_ExtensionObject(stream,options);
}

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadResult.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_StatusCode(this.statusCode,stream);
    encode_ByteString(this.continuationPoint,stream);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.historyData,stream);
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};
/**
...

module node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadValueId

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadValueId (options)

  • description and source-code
    function HistoryReadValueId(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property nodeId
      * @type {NodeId}
      */
    self.nodeId = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.nodeId);

    /**
      *
      * @property indexRange
      * @type {String}
      */
    self.indexRange = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.indexRange);

    /**
      *
      * @property dataEncoding
      * @type {QualifiedName}
      */
    self.dataEncoding =  new QualifiedName( options.dataEncoding);

    /**
      *
      * @property continuationPoint
      * @type {ByteString}
      * @default  null
      */
    self.continuationPoint = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.continuationPoint);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryReadValueId.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.nodeId = decode_NodeId(stream,options);
    this.indexRange = decode_String(stream,options);
    this.dataEncoding.decode(stream,options);
    this.continuationPoint = decode_ByteString(stream,options);
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

if (messageHeader.msgType === "ERR") {

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_NodeId(this.nodeId,stream);
    encode_String(this.indexRange,stream);
   this.dataEncoding.encode(stream,options);
    encode_ByteString(this.continuationPoint,stream);
}
  • example usage

ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

module node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryUpdateRequest

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryUpdateRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function HistoryUpdateRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property historyUpdateDetails
      * @type {ExtensionObject[]}
      */
    self.historyUpdateDetails = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[1], options.historyUpdateDetails);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

module node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryUpdateResponse

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryUpdateResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function HistoryUpdateResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {HistoryUpdateResult[]}
      */
    self.results = [];
    if (options.results) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.results));
        self.results = options.results.map(function(e){ return new HistoryUpdateResult(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryUpdateResponse.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryUpdateResponse.prototype

function node-opcua.historizing_service.HistoryUpdateResponse.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.responseHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.results = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new HistoryUpdateResult();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
    this.diagnosticInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

if (messageHeader.msgType === "ERR") {

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.responseHeader.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.results,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.diagnosticInfos,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
}

module node-opcua.historizing_service.ModificationInfo

function node-opcua.historizing_service.ModificationInfo (options)

  • description and source-code
    function ModificationInfo(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * The name of the user that made the modification. Support for this field is optional. A null shall be returned if it is not
 defined.
      * @property username
      * @type {String}
      */
    self.username = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.username);

    /**
      *  The time the modification was made. Support for this field is optional. A null shall be returned if it is not defined.
      * @property modificationTime
      * @type {UtcTime}
      */
    self.modificationTime = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.modificationTime);

    /**
      *  The modification type for the item.
      * @property updateType
      * @type {HistoryUpdateType}
      */
    self.setUpdateType(initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.updateType));

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.historizing_service.ModificationInfo.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.historizing_service.ModificationInfo.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.username = decode_String(stream,options);
    this.modificationTime = decode_UtcTime(stream,options);
    this.updateType = decode_HistoryUpdateType(stream,options);
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}

function node-opcua.historizing_service.ModificationInfo.prototype.setUpdateType (value)

  • description and source-code
    setUpdateType = function (value) {
   var coercedValue = _enumerations.HistoryUpdateType.typedEnum.get(value);
   /* istanbul ignore next */
   if (coercedValue === undefined || coercedValue === null) {
      throw new Error("value cannot be coerced to HistoryUpdateType: " + value);
   }
   this.updateType = coercedValue;
}
  • example usage
    ...
    self.modificationTime = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.modificationTime);

    /**
      *  The modification type for the item.
      * @property updateType
      * @type {HistoryUpdateType}
      */
    self.setUpdateType(initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.updateType));

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
util.inherits(ModificationInfo,BaseUAObject);

    function ReadAtTimeDetails(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */

    var self = this;

    HistoryReadDetails.call(this,options);

      *
      * @property reqTimes
      * @type {DateTime[]}

    /**
      *
      * @property useSimpleBounds
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.useSimpleBounds = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.useSimpleBounds);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);

module node-opcua.historizing_service.ReadEventDetails

function node-opcua.historizing_service.ReadEventDetails (options)

  • description and source-code
    function ReadEventDetails(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    HistoryReadDetails.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property numValuesPerNode
      * @type {UInt32}
      */
    self.numValuesPerNode = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.numValuesPerNode);

    /**
      *
      * @property startTime
      * @type {DateTime}
      */
    self.startTime = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.startTime);

    /**
      *
      * @property endTime
      * @type {DateTime}
      */
    self.endTime = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.endTime);

    /**
      *
      * @property filter
      * @type {EventFilter}
      */
    self.filter =  new EventFilter( options.filter);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    this.numValuesPerNode = decode_UInt32(stream,options);
    this.startTime = decode_DateTime(stream,options);
    this.endTime = decode_DateTime(stream,options);
    this.filter.decode(stream,options);
}

module node-opcua.historizing_service.ReadProcessedDetails

function node-opcua.historizing_service.ReadProcessedDetails (options)

  • description and source-code
    function ReadProcessedDetails(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    HistoryReadDetails.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property startTime
      * @type {DateTime}
      */
    self.startTime = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.startTime);

    /**
      *
      * @property endTime
      * @type {DateTime}
      */
    self.endTime = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.endTime);

    /**
      *
      * @property processingInterval
      * @type {DateTime}
      */
    self.processingInterval = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.processingInterval);

    /**
      *
      * @property aggregateType
      * @type {NodeId[]}
      */
    self.aggregateType = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[3], options.aggregateType);

    /**
      *
      * @property aggregateConfiguration
      * @type {AggregateConfiguration}
      */
    self.aggregateConfiguration =  new AggregateConfiguration( options.aggregateConfiguration);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.historizing_service.ReadProcessedDetails.prototype

function node-opcua.historizing_service.ReadProcessedDetails.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    HistoryReadDetails.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.startTime = decode_DateTime(stream,options);
    this.endTime = decode_DateTime(stream,options);
    this.processingInterval = decode_DateTime(stream,options);
    this.aggregateType = decodeArray(stream, decode_NodeId);
    this.aggregateConfiguration.decode(stream,options);
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

if (messageHeader.msgType === "ERR") {

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

function node-opcua.historizing_service.ReadProcessedDetails.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    HistoryReadDetails.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_DateTime(this.startTime,stream);
    encode_DateTime(this.endTime,stream);
    encode_DateTime(this.processingInterval,stream);
    encodeArray(this.aggregateType, stream, encode_NodeId);
   this.aggregateConfiguration.encode(stream,options);
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};
/**
...

module node-opcua.historizing_service.ReadRawModifiedDetails

function node-opcua.historizing_service.ReadRawModifiedDetails (options)

  • description and source-code
    function ReadRawModifiedDetails(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    HistoryReadDetails.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property isReadModified
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.isReadModified = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.isReadModified);

    /**
      *
      * @property startTime
      * @type {DateTime}
      */
    self.startTime = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.startTime);

    /**
      *
      * @property endTime
      * @type {DateTime}
      */
    self.endTime = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.endTime);

    /**
      *
      * @property numValuesPerNode
      * @type {UInt32}
      */
    self.numValuesPerNode = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.numValuesPerNode);

    /**
      *
      * @property returnBounds
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.returnBounds = initialize_field(schema.fields[4], options.returnBounds);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    this.startTime = decode_DateTime(stream,options);
    this.endTime = decode_DateTime(stream,options);
    this.numValuesPerNode = decode_UInt32(stream,options);

function node-opcua.historizing_service.ReadRawModifiedDetails.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    HistoryReadDetails.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_Boolean(this.isReadModified,stream);
    encode_DateTime(this.startTime,stream);
    encode_DateTime(this.endTime,stream);
    encode_UInt32(this.numValuesPerNode,stream);
    encode_Boolean(this.returnBounds,stream);
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

module node-opcua.node_managment_service

function node-opcua.node_managment_service.AddNodesRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function AddNodesRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property nodesToAdd
      * @type {AddNodesItem[]}
      */
    self.nodesToAdd = [];
    if (options.nodesToAdd) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.nodesToAdd));
        self.nodesToAdd = options.nodesToAdd.map(function(e){ return new AddNodesItem(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.node_managment_service.AddNodesResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function AddNodesResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {AddNodesResult[]}
      */
    self.results = [];
    if (options.results) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.results));
        self.results = options.results.map(function(e){ return new AddNodesResult(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnostics
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnostics = [];
    if (options.diagnostics) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnostics));
        self.diagnostics = options.diagnostics.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.requestHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.nodesToAdd = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new AddNodesItem();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}

    function AddNodesResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {AddNodesResult[]}
      */
    self.results = [];
    if (options.results) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.results));
        self.results = options.results.map(function(e){ return new AddNodesResult(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnostics
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnostics = [];
    if (options.diagnostics) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnostics));
        self.diagnostics = options.diagnostics.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);

module node-opcua.node_managment_service.AddNodesResponse.prototype

function node-opcua.node_managment_service.AddNodesResponse.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.responseHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.results = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new AddNodesResult();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
    this.diagnostics = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}

module node-opcua.node_managment_service.AddReferencesRequest.prototype

function node-opcua.node_managment_service.AddReferencesRequest.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.requestHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.referencesToAdd = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new AddReferencesItem();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

if (messageHeader.msgType === "ERR") {

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

function node-opcua.node_managment_service.AddReferencesRequest.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.referencesToAdd,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

...

module node-opcua.node_managment_service.AddReferencesResponse

function node-opcua.node_managment_service.AddReferencesResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function AddReferencesResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {StatusCode[]}
      */
    self.results = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[1], options.results);

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnostics
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnostics = [];
    if (options.diagnostics) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnostics));
        self.diagnostics = options.diagnostics.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.node_managment_service.AddReferencesResponse.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.responseHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.results = decodeArray(stream, decode_StatusCode);
    this.diagnostics = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}

module node-opcua.node_managment_service.DeleteNodesRequest

function node-opcua.node_managment_service.DeleteNodesRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function DeleteNodesRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property nodesToDelete
      * @type {DeleteNodesItem[]}
      */
    self.nodesToDelete = [];
    if (options.nodesToDelete) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.nodesToDelete));
        self.nodesToDelete = options.nodesToDelete.map(function(e){ return new DeleteNodesItem(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage

       var obj = new DeleteNodesItem();
       obj.decode(stream,options);

function node-opcua.node_managment_service.DeleteNodesResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function DeleteNodesResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {StatusCode[]}
      */
    self.results = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[1], options.results);

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnostics
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnostics = [];
    if (options.diagnostics) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnostics));
        self.diagnostics = options.diagnostics.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

module node-opcua.node_managment_service.DeleteReferencesRequest

function node-opcua.node_managment_service.DeleteReferencesRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function DeleteReferencesRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property referencesToDelete
      * @type {DeleteReferencesItem[]}
      */
    self.referencesToDelete = [];
    if (options.referencesToDelete) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.referencesToDelete));
        self.referencesToDelete = options.referencesToDelete.map(function(e){ return new DeleteReferencesItem(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

    var self = this;

module node-opcua.nodeopcua

function node-opcua.nodeopcua.TCPErrorMessage (options)

  • description and source-code
    function TCPErrorMessage(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property statusCode
      * @type {StatusCode}
      */
    self.statusCode = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.statusCode);

    /**
      *
      * @property reason
      * @type {String}
      */
    self.reason = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.reason);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    ...
    console.log(hexDump(data));
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

if (messageHeader.msgType === "ERR") {

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

function node-opcua.nodeopcua.decodeMessage (stream, ClassName)

  • description and source-code
    function decodeMessage(stream, ClassName) {

    assert(stream instanceof BinaryStream);
    assert(ClassName instanceof Function, " expecting a function for " + ClassName);

    var header = readMessageHeader(stream);
    assert(stream.length === 8);

    var obj;
    if (header.msgType === "ERR") {
        //xx console.log(" received an error");
        obj = new TCPErrorMessage();
        obj.decode(stream);
        return obj;
    } else {
        obj = new ClassName();
        obj.decode(stream);
        return obj;
    }
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.nodeopcua.is_valid_endpointUrl (endpointUrl)

  • description and source-code
    function is_valid_endpointUrl(endpointUrl) {
    var e = parseEndpointUrl(endpointUrl);
    return e.hasOwnProperty("hostname");
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.nodeopcua.packTcpMessage (msgType, encodableObject)

  • description and source-code
    function packTcpMessage(msgType, encodableObject) {

    assert(is_valid_msg_type(msgType));

    var messageChunk = createFastUninitializedBuffer(encodableObject.binaryStoreSize() + 8);
    // encode encodeableObject in a packet
    var stream = new BinaryStream(messageChunk);
    encodeMessage(msgType, encodableObject, stream);

    return messageChunk;

}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.nodeopcua.parseEndpointUrl (endpoint_url)

  • description and source-code
    function parseEndpointUrl(endpoint_url) {

    var r = /^([a-z.]*):\/\/([a-zA-Z\_\-\.\-0-9]*):([0-9]*)(\/.*){0,1}/;

    var matches = r.exec(endpoint_url);

    if(!matches) {
        throw new Error("Invalid endpoint url ",endpoint_url);
    }
    return {
        protocol: matches[1],
        hostname: matches[2],
        port: parseInt(matches[3], 10),
        address: matches[4] || ""
    };
}
  • example usage
    ...
set_debug(flag);
break;
        case 'open':
var endpoint_url = args[1];
if (!endpoint_url.match(/^opc.tcp:\/\//)) {
    endpoint_url = "opc.tcp://" + endpoint_url;
}
var p = opcua.parseEndpointUrl(endpoint_url);
var hostname = p.hostname;
var port = p.port;
log(" open    url : ", endpoint_url);
log("    hostname : ", (hostname || "<null>").yellow);
log("        port : ", port.toString().yellow);

apply_command(cmd,function(callback) {
...

function node-opcua.nodeopcua.writeTCPMessageHeader (msgType, chunkType, total_length, stream)

  • description and source-code
    writeTCPMessageHeader = function (msgType, chunkType, total_length, stream) {

    if (stream instanceof Buffer) {
        stream = new BinaryStream(stream);
    }
    assert(is_valid_msg_type(msgType));
    assert(["A", "F", "C"].indexOf(chunkType) !== -1);

    stream.writeUInt8(msgType.charCodeAt(0));
    stream.writeUInt8(msgType.charCodeAt(1));
    stream.writeUInt8(msgType.charCodeAt(2));
    // Chunk type
    stream.writeUInt8(chunkType.charCodeAt(0)); // reserved

    stream.writeUInt32(total_length);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.query_service

function node-opcua.query_service.QueryFirstRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function QueryFirstRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property view
      * @type {ViewDescription}
      */
    self.view =  new ViewDescription( options.view);

    /**
      *
      * @property nodeTypes
      * @type {NodeTypeDescription[]}
      */
    self.nodeTypes = [];
    if (options.nodeTypes) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.nodeTypes));
        self.nodeTypes = options.nodeTypes.map(function(e){ return new NodeTypeDescription(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property filter
      * @type {ContentFilter}
      */
    self.filter =  new ContentFilter( options.filter);

    /**
      *
      * @property maxDataSetsToReturn
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.maxDataSetsToReturn = initialize_field(schema.fields[4], options.maxDataSetsToReturn);

    /**
      *
      * @property maxReferencesToReturn
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.maxReferencesToReturn = initialize_field(schema.fields[5], options.maxReferencesToReturn);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.query_service.QueryFirstResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function QueryFirstResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property queryDataSet
      * @type {QueryDataSet[]}
      */
    self.queryDataSet = [];
    if (options.queryDataSet) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.queryDataSet));
        self.queryDataSet = options.queryDataSet.map(function(e){ return new QueryDataSet(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property continuationPoint
      * @type {ContinuationPoint}
      */
    self.continuationPoint = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.continuationPoint);

    /**
      *
      * @property parsingResult
      * @type {ParsingResult[]}
      */
    self.parsingResult = [];
    if (options.parsingResult) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.parsingResult));
        self.parsingResult = options.parsingResult.map(function(e){ return new ParsingResult(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property filterResult
      * @type {ContentFilterResult}
      */
    self.filterResult =  new ContentFilterResult( options.filterResult);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    function QueryNextRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */

    var self = this;

    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

      * A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

      * @type {RequestHeader}

    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);
