module node-opcua.subscription_service.ContentFilter

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ContentFilter (options)

  • description and source-code
    function ContentFilter(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property elements
      * @type {ContentFilterElement[]}
      */
    self.elements = [];
    if (options.elements) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.elements));
        self.elements = options.elements.map(function(e){ return new ContentFilterElement(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ContentFilter.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.subscription_service.ContentFilter.prototype

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ContentFilter.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.elements = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new ContentFilterElement();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}

    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ContentFilter.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.elements,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

...

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ContentFilterElement (options)

  • description and source-code
    function ContentFilterElement(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property filterOperator
      * @type {FilterOperator}
      */
    self.setFilterOperator(initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.filterOperator));

    /**
      *
      * @property filterOperands
      * @type {ExtensionObject[]}
      */
    self.filterOperands = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[1], options.filterOperands);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ContentFilterElement.prototype.setFilterOperator (value)

  • description and source-code
    setFilterOperator = function (value) {
   var coercedValue = _enumerations.FilterOperator.typedEnum.get(value);
   /* istanbul ignore next */
   if (coercedValue === undefined || coercedValue === null) {
      throw new Error("value cannot be coerced to FilterOperator: " + value);
   }
   this.filterOperator = coercedValue;
}

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ContentFilterElementResult (options)

  • description and source-code
    function ContentFilterElementResult(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property statusCode
      * @type {StatusCode}
      */
    self.statusCode = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.statusCode);

    /**
      *
      * @property operandStatusCodes
      * @type {StatusCode}
      */
    self.operandStatusCodes = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.operandStatusCodes);

    /**
      *
      * @property operandDiagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo}
      */
    self.operandDiagnosticInfos =  new DiagnosticInfo( options.operandDiagnosticInfos);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

module node-opcua.subscription_service.ContentFilterResult

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ContentFilterResult (options)

  • description and source-code
    function ContentFilterResult(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property elementResults
      * @type {ContentFilterElementResult[]}
      */
    self.elementResults = [];
    if (options.elementResults) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.elementResults));
        self.elementResults = options.elementResults.map(function(e){ return new ContentFilterElementResult(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property elementDiagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.elementDiagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.elementDiagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.elementDiagnosticInfos));
        self.elementDiagnosticInfos = options.elementDiagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ContentFilterResult.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.subscription_service.ContentFilterResult.prototype

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ContentFilterResult.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.elementResults = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new ContentFilterElementResult();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
    this.elementDiagnosticInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
  • example usage

    return;

    console.log(hexDump(data));

module node-opcua.subscription_service.CreateMonitoredItemsRequest

function node-opcua.subscription_service.CreateMonitoredItemsRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function CreateMonitoredItemsRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property subscriptionId
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.subscriptionId = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.subscriptionId);

    /**
      *
      * @property timestampsToReturn
      * @type {TimestampsToReturn}
      */
    self.setTimestampsToReturn(initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.timestampsToReturn));

    /**
      *
      * @property itemsToCreate
      * @type {MonitoredItemCreateRequest[]}
      */
    self.itemsToCreate = [];
    if (options.itemsToCreate) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.itemsToCreate));
        self.itemsToCreate = options.itemsToCreate.map(function(e){ return new MonitoredItemCreateRequest(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.requestHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.subscriptionId = decode_IntegerId(stream,options);
    this.timestampsToReturn = decode_TimestampsToReturn(stream,options);
    this.itemsToCreate = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new MonitoredItemCreateRequest();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}

module node-opcua.subscription_service.CreateMonitoredItemsResponse

function node-opcua.subscription_service.CreateMonitoredItemsResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function CreateMonitoredItemsResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {MonitoredItemCreateResult[]}
      */
    self.results = [];
    if (options.results) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.results));
        self.results = options.results.map(function(e){ return new MonitoredItemCreateResult(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

  • example usage

    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.responseHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.results = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new MonitoredItemCreateResult();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
    this.diagnosticInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}

module node-opcua.subscription_service.CreateSubscriptionRequest

function node-opcua.subscription_service.CreateSubscriptionRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function CreateSubscriptionRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestedPublishingInterval
      * @type {Duration}
      */
    self.requestedPublishingInterval = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.requestedPublishingInterval);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestedLifetimeCount
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.requestedLifetimeCount = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.requestedLifetimeCount);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestedMaxKeepAliveCount
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.requestedMaxKeepAliveCount = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.requestedMaxKeepAliveCount);

    /**
      *
      * @property maxNotificationsPerPublish
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.maxNotificationsPerPublish = initialize_field(schema.fields[4], options.maxNotificationsPerPublish);

    /**
      *
      * @property publishingEnabled
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.publishingEnabled = initialize_field(schema.fields[5], options.publishingEnabled);

    /**
      *
      * @property priority
      * @type {Byte}
      */
    self.priority = initialize_field(schema.fields[6], options.priority);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.subscription_service.CreateSubscriptionRequest.prototype

function node-opcua.subscription_service.CreateSubscriptionRequest.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.requestHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.requestedPublishingInterval = decode_Duration(stream,options);
    this.requestedLifetimeCount = decode_Counter(stream,options);
    this.requestedMaxKeepAliveCount = decode_Counter(stream,options);
    this.maxNotificationsPerPublish = decode_Counter(stream,options);
    this.publishingEnabled = decode_Boolean(stream,options);
    this.priority = decode_Byte(stream,options);
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}

    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
    encode_Duration(this.requestedPublishingInterval,stream);
    encode_Counter(this.requestedLifetimeCount,stream);
    encode_Counter(this.requestedMaxKeepAliveCount,stream);
    encode_Counter(this.maxNotificationsPerPublish,stream);
    encode_Boolean(this.publishingEnabled,stream);
    encode_Byte(this.priority,stream);
}

 * @param stream {BinaryStream}

    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);

module node-opcua.subscription_service.CreateSubscriptionResponse

function node-opcua.subscription_service.CreateSubscriptionResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function CreateSubscriptionResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property subscriptionId
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.subscriptionId = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.subscriptionId);

    /**
      *
      * @property revisedPublishingInterval
      * @type {Duration}
      */
    self.revisedPublishingInterval = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.revisedPublishingInterval);

    /**
      *
      * @property revisedLifetimeCount
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.revisedLifetimeCount = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.revisedLifetimeCount);

    /**
      *
      * @property revisedMaxKeepAliveCount
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.revisedMaxKeepAliveCount = initialize_field(schema.fields[4], options.revisedMaxKeepAliveCount);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    function BaseUAObject() {

function node-opcua.subscription_service.CreateSubscriptionResponse.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.responseHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.subscriptionId = decode_IntegerId(stream,options);
    this.revisedPublishingInterval = decode_Duration(stream,options);
    this.revisedLifetimeCount = decode_Counter(stream,options);
    this.revisedMaxKeepAliveCount = decode_Counter(stream,options);
}

    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));

function node-opcua.subscription_service.CreateSubscriptionResponse.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.responseHeader.encode(stream,options);
    encode_IntegerId(this.subscriptionId,stream);
    encode_Duration(this.revisedPublishingInterval,stream);
    encode_Counter(this.revisedLifetimeCount,stream);
    encode_Counter(this.revisedMaxKeepAliveCount,stream);
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

module node-opcua.subscription_service.DataChangeFilter

function node-opcua.subscription_service.DataChangeFilter (options)

  • description and source-code
    function DataChangeFilter(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property trigger
      * @type {DataChangeTrigger}
      */
    self.setTrigger(initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.trigger));

    /**
      *
      * @property deadbandType
      * @type {DeadbandType}
      */
    self.setDeadbandType(initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.deadbandType));

    /**
      *
      * @property deadbandValue
      * @type {Double}
      */
    self.deadbandValue = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.deadbandValue);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.trigger = decode_DataChangeTrigger(stream,options);
    this.deadbandType = decode_DeadbandType(stream,options);
    this.deadbandValue = decode_Double(stream,options);
}

   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);

    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);

function node-opcua.subscription_service.DataChangeFilter.prototype.setDeadbandType (value)

  • description and source-code
    setDeadbandType = function (value) {
   var coercedValue = _enumerations.DeadbandType.typedEnum.get(value);
   /* istanbul ignore next */
   if (coercedValue === undefined || coercedValue === null) {
      throw new Error("value cannot be coerced to DeadbandType: " + value);
   }
   this.deadbandType = coercedValue;
}
  • example usage
    ...

  *
  * @property deadbandValue
  * @type {Double}
  */
self.deadbandValue = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.deadbandValue);

    setTrigger = function (value) {
   var coercedValue = _enumerations.DataChangeTrigger.typedEnum.get(value);
   /* istanbul ignore next */
   if (coercedValue === undefined || coercedValue === null) {
      throw new Error("value cannot be coerced to DataChangeTrigger: " + value);
   }
   this.trigger = coercedValue;
}

module node-opcua.subscription_service.DataChangeNotification

function node-opcua.subscription_service.DataChangeNotification (options)

  • description and source-code
    function DataChangeNotification(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property monitoredItems
      * @type {MonitoredItemNotification[]}
      */
    self.monitoredItems = [];
    if (options.monitoredItems) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.monitoredItems));
        self.monitoredItems = options.monitoredItems.map(function(e){ return new MonitoredItemNotification(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.subscription_service.DataChangeNotification.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.subscription_service.DataChangeNotification.prototype

function node-opcua.subscription_service.DataChangeNotification.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.monitoredItems = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new MonitoredItemNotification();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
    this.diagnosticInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

    encodeArray(this.monitoredItems,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.diagnosticInfos,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
}

module node-opcua.subscription_service.DeleteMonitoredItemsRequest

function node-opcua.subscription_service.DeleteMonitoredItemsRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function DeleteMonitoredItemsRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property subscriptionId
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.subscriptionId = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.subscriptionId);

    /**
      *
      * @property monitoredItemIds
      * @type {IntegerId[]}
      */
    self.monitoredItemIds = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[2], options.monitoredItemIds);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

module node-opcua.subscription_service.DeleteMonitoredItemsResponse

function node-opcua.subscription_service.DeleteMonitoredItemsResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function DeleteMonitoredItemsResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {StatusCode[]}
      */
    self.results = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[1], options.results);

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

  • description and source-code
    function ElementOperand(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    FilterOperand.call(this,options);

    /**
      * Index into the element array
      * @property index
      * @type {UInt32}
      */
    self.index = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.index);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ElementOperand.super_ (options)

  • description and source-code
    function FilterOperand(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ElementOperand.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    FilterOperand.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_UInt32(this.index,stream);
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};
/**
...

module node-opcua.subscription_service.EventFieldList

function node-opcua.subscription_service.EventFieldList (options)

  • description and source-code
    function EventFieldList(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * Client-supplied handle for the MonitoredItem
      * @property clientHandle
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.clientHandle = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.clientHandle);

    /**
      * List of selected Event fields. This shall be a one to one match with the fields selected in the EventFilter.
      * @property eventFields
      * @type {Variant[]}
      */
    self.eventFields = [];
    if (options.eventFields) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.eventFields));
        self.eventFields = options.eventFields.map(function(e){ return new Variant(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.subscription_service.EventFieldList.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.subscription_service.EventFieldList.prototype

function node-opcua.subscription_service.EventFieldList.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.clientHandle = decode_IntegerId(stream,options);
    this.eventFields = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new Variant();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}

    return;

    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));

    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_IntegerId(this.clientHandle,stream);
    encodeArray(this.eventFields,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
}

   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);

module node-opcua.subscription_service.EventFilter

function node-opcua.subscription_service.EventFilter (options)

  • description and source-code
    function EventFilter(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    MonitoringFilter.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property selectClauses
      * @type {SimpleAttributeOperand[]}
      */
    self.selectClauses = [];
    if (options.selectClauses) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.selectClauses));
        self.selectClauses = options.selectClauses.map(function(e){ return new SimpleAttributeOperand(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property whereClause
      * @type {ContentFilter}
      */
    self.whereClause =  new ContentFilter( options.whereClause);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    options = options || {};

    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    MonitoringFilter.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.selectClauses = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new SimpleAttributeOperand();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
    this.whereClause.decode(stream,options);
}

module node-opcua.subscription_service.EventFilterResult

function node-opcua.subscription_service.EventFilterResult (options)

  • description and source-code
    function EventFilterResult(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    MonitoringFilter.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property selectClauseResults
      * @type {StatusCode[]}
      */
    self.selectClauseResults = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[0], options.selectClauseResults);

    /**
      *
      * @property selectClauseDiagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.selectClauseDiagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.selectClauseDiagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.selectClauseDiagnosticInfos));
        self.selectClauseDiagnosticInfos = options.selectClauseDiagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property whereClauseResult
      * @type {ContentFilterResult}
      */
    self.whereClauseResult =  new ContentFilterResult( options.whereClauseResult);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    MonitoringFilter.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.selectClauseResults = decodeArray(stream, decode_StatusCode);
    this.selectClauseDiagnosticInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
    this.whereClauseResult.decode(stream,options);
}

module node-opcua.subscription_service.EventNotificationList

function node-opcua.subscription_service.EventNotificationList (options)

  • description and source-code
    function EventNotificationList(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * The list of Events being delivered. This structure is defined in-line with the following indented items.
      * @property events
      * @type {EventFieldList[]}
      */
    self.events = [];
    if (options.events) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.events));
        self.events = options.events.map(function(e){ return new EventFieldList(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });

module node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifyMonitoredItemsRequest

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifyMonitoredItemsRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function ModifyMonitoredItemsRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property subscriptionId
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.subscriptionId = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.subscriptionId);

    /**
      *
      * @property timestampsToReturn
      * @type {TimestampsToReturn}
      */
    self.setTimestampsToReturn(initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.timestampsToReturn));

    /**
      *
      * @property itemsToModify
      * @type {MonitoredItemModifyRequest[]}
      */
    self.itemsToModify = [];
    if (options.itemsToModify) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.itemsToModify));
        self.itemsToModify = options.itemsToModify.map(function(e){ return new MonitoredItemModifyRequest(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifyMonitoredItemsRequest.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.requestHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.subscriptionId = decode_IntegerId(stream,options);
    this.timestampsToReturn = decode_TimestampsToReturn(stream,options);
    this.itemsToModify = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new MonitoredItemModifyRequest();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;

    console.log(hexDump(data));

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifyMonitoredItemsRequest.prototype.setTimestampsToReturn (value)

  • description and source-code
    setTimestampsToReturn = function (value) {
   var coercedValue = _enumerations.TimestampsToReturn.typedEnum.get(value);
   /* istanbul ignore next */
   if (coercedValue === undefined || coercedValue === null) {
      throw new Error("value cannot be coerced to TimestampsToReturn: " + value);
   }
   this.timestampsToReturn = coercedValue;
}
  • example usage
    ...
self.subscriptionId = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.subscriptionId);

/**
  *
  * @property timestampsToReturn
  * @type {TimestampsToReturn}
  */
self.setTimestampsToReturn(initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.timestampsToReturn
));

/**
  *
  * @property itemsToCreate
  * @type {MonitoredItemCreateRequest[]}
  */
self.itemsToCreate = [];
...

module node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifyMonitoredItemsResponse

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifyMonitoredItemsResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function ModifyMonitoredItemsResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {MonitoredItemModifyResult[]}
      */
    self.results = [];
    if (options.results) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.results));
        self.results = options.results.map(function(e){ return new MonitoredItemModifyResult(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifyMonitoredItemsResponse.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifyMonitoredItemsResponse.prototype

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifyMonitoredItemsResponse.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.responseHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.results = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new MonitoredItemModifyResult();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
    this.diagnosticInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

if (messageHeader.msgType === "ERR") {

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifyMonitoredItemsResponse.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.responseHeader.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.results,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.diagnosticInfos,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

module node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifySubscriptionRequest

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifySubscriptionRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function ModifySubscriptionRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property subscriptionId
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.subscriptionId = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.subscriptionId);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestedPublishingInterval
      * @type {Duration}
      */
    self.requestedPublishingInterval = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.requestedPublishingInterval);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestedLifetimeCount
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.requestedLifetimeCount = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.requestedLifetimeCount);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestedMaxKeepAliveCount
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.requestedMaxKeepAliveCount = initialize_field(schema.fields[4], options.requestedMaxKeepAliveCount);

    /**
      *
      * @property maxNotificationsPerPublish
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.maxNotificationsPerPublish = initialize_field(schema.fields[5], options.maxNotificationsPerPublish);

    /**
      *
      * @property priority
      * @type {Byte}
      */
    self.priority = initialize_field(schema.fields[6], options.priority);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifySubscriptionRequest.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifySubscriptionRequest.prototype

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifySubscriptionRequest.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.requestHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.subscriptionId = decode_IntegerId(stream,options);
    this.requestedPublishingInterval = decode_Duration(stream,options);
    this.requestedLifetimeCount = decode_Counter(stream,options);
    this.requestedMaxKeepAliveCount = decode_Counter(stream,options);
    this.maxNotificationsPerPublish = decode_Counter(stream,options);
    this.priority = decode_Byte(stream,options);
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

if (messageHeader.msgType === "ERR") {

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifySubscriptionRequest.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
    encode_IntegerId(this.subscriptionId,stream);
    encode_Duration(this.requestedPublishingInterval,stream);
    encode_Counter(this.requestedLifetimeCount,stream);
    encode_Counter(this.requestedMaxKeepAliveCount,stream);
    encode_Counter(this.maxNotificationsPerPublish,stream);
    encode_Byte(this.priority,stream);
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

function node-opcua.subscription_service.ModifySubscriptionResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function ModifySubscriptionResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property revisedPublishingInterval
      * @type {Duration}
      */
    self.revisedPublishingInterval = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.revisedPublishingInterval);

    /**
      *
      * @property revisedLifetimeCount
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.revisedLifetimeCount = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.revisedLifetimeCount);

    /**
      *
      * @property revisedMaxKeepAliveCount
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.revisedMaxKeepAliveCount = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.revisedMaxKeepAliveCount);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

module node-opcua.subscription_service.MonitoredItemCreateRequest

function node-opcua.subscription_service.MonitoredItemCreateRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function MonitoredItemCreateRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property itemToMonitor
      * @type {ReadValueId}
      */
    self.itemToMonitor =  new ReadValueId( options.itemToMonitor);

    /**
      *
      * @property monitoringMode
      * @type {MonitoringMode}
      */
    self.setMonitoringMode(initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.monitoringMode));

    /**
      *
      * @property requestedParameters
      * @type {MonitoringParameters}
      */
    self.requestedParameters =  new MonitoringParameters( options.requestedParameters);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    this.itemToMonitor.decode(stream,options);
    this.monitoringMode = decode_MonitoringMode(stream,options);
    this.requestedParameters.decode(stream,options);
}

function node-opcua.subscription_service.MonitoredItemCreateRequest.prototype.setMonitoringMode (value)

  • description and source-code
    setMonitoringMode = function (value) {
   var coercedValue = _enumerations.MonitoringMode.typedEnum.get(value);
   /* istanbul ignore next */
   if (coercedValue === undefined || coercedValue === null) {
      throw new Error("value cannot be coerced to MonitoringMode: " + value);
   }
   this.monitoringMode = coercedValue;
}
  • example usage
    ...
self.itemToMonitor =  new ReadValueId( options.itemToMonitor);

/**
  *
  * @property monitoringMode
  * @type {MonitoringMode}
  */
self.setMonitoringMode(initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.monitoringMode));

/**
  *
  * @property requestedParameters
  * @type {MonitoringParameters}
  */
self.requestedParameters =  new MonitoringParameters( options.requestedParameters);

function node-opcua.subscription_service.MonitoredItemCreateResult (options)

  • description and source-code
    function MonitoredItemCreateResult(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property statusCode
      * @type {StatusCode}
      */
    self.statusCode = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.statusCode);

    /**
      *
      * @property monitoredItemId
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.monitoredItemId = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.monitoredItemId);

    /**
      *
      * @property revisedSamplingInterval
      * @type {Duration}
      */
    self.revisedSamplingInterval = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.revisedSamplingInterval);

    /**
      *
      * @property revisedQueueSize
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.revisedQueueSize = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.revisedQueueSize);

    /**
      *
      * @property filterResult
      * @type {ExtensionObject}
      */
    self.filterResult = initialize_field(schema.fields[4], options.filterResult);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

module node-opcua.subscription_service.MonitoredItemNotification

function node-opcua.subscription_service.MonitoredItemNotification (options)

  • description and source-code
    function MonitoredItemNotification(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * Client-supplied handle for the MonitoredItem.
      * @property clientHandle
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.clientHandle = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.clientHandle);

    /**
      * The StatusCode, value and timestamp(s) of the monitored Attribute depending on the sampling and queuing configuration.
      * @property value
      * @type {DataValue}
      */
    self.value =  new DataValue( options.value);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    function BaseUAObject() {

    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.clientHandle = decode_IntegerId(stream,options);
    this.value.decode(stream,options);
}

    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);

function node-opcua.subscription_service.MonitoredItemNotification.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_IntegerId(this.clientHandle,stream);
   this.value.encode(stream,options);
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

module node-opcua.subscription_service.MonitoringParameters

function node-opcua.subscription_service.MonitoringParameters (options)

  • description and source-code
    function MonitoringParameters(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property clientHandle
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.clientHandle = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.clientHandle);

    /**
      *
      * @property samplingInterval
      * @type {Duration}
      */
    self.samplingInterval = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.samplingInterval);

    /**
      *
      * @property filter
      * @type {ExtensionObject}
      */
    self.filter = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.filter);

    /**
      *
      * @property queueSize
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.queueSize = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.queueSize);

    /**
      *
      * @property discardOldest
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.discardOldest = initialize_field(schema.fields[4], options.discardOldest);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    function BaseUAObject() {

module node-opcua.subscription_service.MonitoringParameters.prototype

function node-opcua.subscription_service.MonitoringParameters.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.clientHandle = decode_IntegerId(stream,options);
    this.samplingInterval = decode_Duration(stream,options);
    this.filter = decode_ExtensionObject(stream,options);
    this.queueSize = decode_Counter(stream,options);
    this.discardOldest = decode_Boolean(stream,options);
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}

    err.decode(stream);

    console.log(hexDump(data));

    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_IntegerId(this.clientHandle,stream);
    encode_Duration(this.samplingInterval,stream);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.filter,stream);
    encode_Counter(this.queueSize,stream);
    encode_Boolean(this.discardOldest,stream);
}

   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);

    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);

   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);

module node-opcua.subscription_service.NotificationMessage

function node-opcua.subscription_service.NotificationMessage (options)

  • description and source-code
    function NotificationMessage(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property sequenceNumber
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.sequenceNumber = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.sequenceNumber);

    /**
      *
      * @property publishTime
      * @type {UtcTime}
      */
    self.publishTime = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.publishTime);

    /**
      *
      * @property notificationData
      * @type {ExtensionObject[]}
      */
    self.notificationData = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[2], options.notificationData);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.sequenceNumber = decode_Counter(stream,options);
    this.publishTime = decode_UtcTime(stream,options);
    this.notificationData = decodeArray(stream, decode_ExtensionObject);
}

    return;

    console.log(hexDump(data));

    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_Counter(this.sequenceNumber,stream);
    encode_UtcTime(this.publishTime,stream);
    encodeArray(this.notificationData, stream, encode_ExtensionObject);

   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);

module node-opcua.subscription_service.PublishRequest

function node-opcua.subscription_service.PublishRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function PublishRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property subscriptionAcknowledgements
      * @type {SubscriptionAcknowledgement[]}
      */
    self.subscriptionAcknowledgements = [];
    if (options.subscriptionAcknowledgements) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.subscriptionAcknowledgements));
        self.subscriptionAcknowledgements = options.subscriptionAcknowledgements.map(function(e){ return new SubscriptionAcknowledgement
(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.subscription_service.PublishRequest.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.subscription_service.PublishRequest.prototype

function node-opcua.subscription_service.PublishRequest.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.requestHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.subscriptionAcknowledgements = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new SubscriptionAcknowledgement();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

module node-opcua.subscription_service.PublishResponse

function node-opcua.subscription_service.PublishResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function PublishResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property subscriptionId
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.subscriptionId = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.subscriptionId);

    /**
      *  a list of sequence number available in the subscription for retransmission and not acknowledged by the client
      * @property availableSequenceNumbers
      * @type {Counter[]}
      */
    self.availableSequenceNumbers = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[2], options.availableSequenceNumbers);

    /**
      * indicates if the server was not able to send all available notification in this publish response
      * @property moreNotifications
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.moreNotifications = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.moreNotifications);

    /**
      *
      * @property notificationMessage
      * @type {NotificationMessage}
      */
    self.notificationMessage =  new NotificationMessage( options.notificationMessage);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {StatusCode[]}
      */
    self.results = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[5], options.results);

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.subscription_service.PublishResponse.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.subscription_service.PublishResponse.prototype

function node-opcua.subscription_service.PublishResponse.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.responseHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.subscriptionId = decode_IntegerId(stream,options);
    this.availableSequenceNumbers = decodeArray(stream, decode_Counter);
    this.moreNotifications = decode_Boolean(stream,options);
    this.notificationMessage.decode(stream,options);
    this.results = decodeArray(stream, decode_StatusCode);
    this.diagnosticInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

if (messageHeader.msgType === "ERR") {

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

function node-opcua.subscription_service.PublishResponse.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.responseHeader.encode(stream,options);
    encode_IntegerId(this.subscriptionId,stream);
    encodeArray(this.availableSequenceNumbers, stream, encode_Counter);
    encode_Boolean(this.moreNotifications,stream);
   this.notificationMessage.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.results, stream, encode_StatusCode);
    encodeArray(this.diagnosticInfos,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */

    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

  • description and source-code
    function RepublishRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property subscriptionId
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.subscriptionId = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.subscriptionId);

    /**
      *
      * @property retransmitSequenceNumber
      * @type {Counter}
      */
    self.retransmitSequenceNumber = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.retransmitSequenceNumber);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

module node-opcua.subscription_service.SetMonitoringModeRequest

function node-opcua.subscription_service.SetMonitoringModeRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function SetMonitoringModeRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property subscriptionId
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.subscriptionId = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.subscriptionId);

    /**
      *
      * @property monitoringMode
      * @type {MonitoringMode}
      */
    self.setMonitoringMode(initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.monitoringMode));

    /**
      *
      * @property monitoredItemIds
      * @type {IntegerId[]}
      */
    self.monitoredItemIds = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[3], options.monitoredItemIds);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.subscription_service.SetMonitoringModeRequest.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.requestHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.subscriptionId = decode_IntegerId(stream,options);
    this.monitoringMode = decode_MonitoringMode(stream,options);
    this.monitoredItemIds = decodeArray(stream, decode_IntegerId);
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

if (messageHeader.msgType === "ERR") {

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
    encode_IntegerId(this.subscriptionId,stream);
    encode_MonitoringMode(this.monitoringMode,stream);
    encodeArray(this.monitoredItemIds, stream, encode_IntegerId);

function node-opcua.subscription_service.SetMonitoringModeRequest.prototype.setMonitoringMode (value)

  • description and source-code
    setMonitoringMode = function (value) {
   var coercedValue = _enumerations.MonitoringMode.typedEnum.get(value);
   /* istanbul ignore next */
   if (coercedValue === undefined || coercedValue === null) {
      throw new Error("value cannot be coerced to MonitoringMode: " + value);
   }
   this.monitoringMode = coercedValue;
}
  • example usage
    ...
self.itemToMonitor =  new ReadValueId( options.itemToMonitor);

  *
  * @property monitoringMode
  * @type {MonitoringMode}
  */
self.setMonitoringMode(initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.monitoringMode));

module node-opcua.subscription_service.SetMonitoringModeResponse

function node-opcua.subscription_service.SetMonitoringModeResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function SetMonitoringModeResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {StatusCode[]}
      */
    self.results = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[1], options.results);

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

    this.results = decodeArray(stream, decode_StatusCode);
    this.diagnosticInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);

  • description and source-code
    function SetPublishingModeRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property publishingEnabled
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.publishingEnabled = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.publishingEnabled);

    /**
      *
      * @property subscriptionIds
      * @type {IntegerId[]}
      */
    self.subscriptionIds = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[2], options.subscriptionIds);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);

    function SetPublishingModeResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {StatusCode[]}
      */
    self.results = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[1], options.results);

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

module node-opcua.subscription_service.SetTriggeringRequest

function node-opcua.subscription_service.SetTriggeringRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function SetTriggeringRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property subscriptionId
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.subscriptionId = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.subscriptionId);

    /**
      *
      * @property triggeringItemId
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.triggeringItemId = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.triggeringItemId);

    /**
      *
      * @property linksToAdd
      * @type {IntegerId[]}
      */
    self.linksToAdd = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[3], options.linksToAdd);

    /**
      *
      * @property linksToRemove
      * @type {IntegerId[]}
      */
    self.linksToRemove = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[4], options.linksToRemove);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

    this.requestHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.subscriptionId = decode_IntegerId(stream,options);
    this.triggeringItemId = decode_IntegerId(stream,options);
    this.linksToAdd = decodeArray(stream, decode_IntegerId);
    this.linksToRemove = decodeArray(stream, decode_IntegerId);
}

module node-opcua.subscription_service.SetTriggeringResponse

function node-opcua.subscription_service.SetTriggeringResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function SetTriggeringResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property addResults
      * @type {StatusCode[]}
      */
    self.addResults = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[1], options.addResults);

    /**
      *
      * @property addDiagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.addDiagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.addDiagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.addDiagnosticInfos));
        self.addDiagnosticInfos = options.addDiagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property removeResults
      * @type {StatusCode[]}
      */
    self.removeResults = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[3], options.removeResults);

    /**
      *
      * @property removeDiagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.removeDiagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.removeDiagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.removeDiagnosticInfos));
        self.removeDiagnosticInfos = options.removeDiagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.responseHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.addResults = decodeArray(stream, decode_StatusCode);
    this.addDiagnosticInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
    this.removeResults = decodeArray(stream, decode_StatusCode);
    this.removeDiagnosticInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
