module node-opcua.subscription_service.SimpleAttributeOperand

function node-opcua.subscription_service.SimpleAttributeOperand (options)

  • description and source-code
    function SimpleAttributeOperand(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    FilterOperand.call(this,options);

    /**
      * NodeId of a TypeDefinitionNode.
      * @property typeId
      * @type {NodeId}
      */
    self.typeId = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.typeId);

    /**
      *
      * @property browsePath
      * @type {QualifiedName[]}
      */
    self.browsePath = [];
    if (options.browsePath) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.browsePath));
        self.browsePath = options.browsePath.map(function(e){ return new QualifiedName(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property attributeId
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.attributeId = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.attributeId);

    /**
      *
      * @property indexRange
      * @type {NumericRange}
      */
    self.indexRange = initialize_field(schema.fields[3], options.indexRange);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.subscription_service.SimpleAttributeOperand.super_ (options)

  • description and source-code
    function FilterOperand(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.subscription_service.SimpleAttributeOperand.prototype

function node-opcua.subscription_service.SimpleAttributeOperand.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    FilterOperand.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.typeId = decode_NodeId(stream,options);
    this.browsePath = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new QualifiedName();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
    this.attributeId = decode_IntegerId(stream,options);
    this.indexRange = decode_NumericRange(stream,options);
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

if (messageHeader.msgType === "ERR") {

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    FilterOperand.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_NodeId(this.typeId,stream);
    encodeArray(this.browsePath,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encode_IntegerId(this.attributeId,stream);
    encode_NumericRange(this.indexRange,stream);
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};
/**
...

function node-opcua.subscription_service.SimpleAttributeOperand.prototype.toPath ()

  • description and source-code
    toPath = function () {
    var self = this;
    return self.browsePath.map(function (a) {
        return a.name;
    }).join("/");
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.subscription_service.SimpleAttributeOperand.prototype.toShortString (addressSpace)

  • description and source-code
    toShortString = function (addressSpace) {

    var self = this;
    var str ="";
    if (addressSpace) {
        var n = addressSpace.findNode( self.typeId);
        str += n.BrowseName.toString()
    }
    str +=  "[" + self.typeId.toString() +"]"+self.toPath();
    return str;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    function StatusChangeNotification(options)

    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;

    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));

function node-opcua.subscription_service.StatusChangeNotification.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_StatusCode(this.statusCode,stream);
   this.diagnosticInfo.encode(stream,options);
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

  • description and source-code
    function TransferSubscriptionsRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

      * @type {RequestHeader}

      *
      * @property sendInitialValues
      * @type {Boolean}
      */

module node-opcua.subscription_service.TransferSubscriptionsResponse

function node-opcua.subscription_service.TransferSubscriptionsResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function TransferSubscriptionsResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {TransferResult[]}
      */
    self.results = [];
    if (options.results) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.results));
        self.results = options.results.map(function(e){ return new TransferResult(e); } );
    }

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.subscription_service.TransferSubscriptionsResponse.prototype

function node-opcua.subscription_service.TransferSubscriptionsResponse.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.responseHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.results = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new TransferResult();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
    this.diagnosticInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}

    console.log(hexDump(data));

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.BrowsePath (options)

  • description and source-code
    function BrowsePath(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

      *
      * @property startingNode
      * @type {NodeId}
      */

    /**
      *
      * @property relativePath
      * @type {RelativePath}
      */
    self.relativePath =  new RelativePath( options.relativePath);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.BrowsePathResult (options)

  • description and source-code
    function BrowsePathResult(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * A code indicating any error during the operation.
      * @property statusCode
      * @type {StatusCode}
      */
    self.statusCode = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.statusCode);

    /**
      * A list of nodes found. The first element matches the type definition.
      * @property targets
      * @type {BrowsePathTarget[]}
      */
    self.targets = [];
    if (options.targets) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.targets));
        self.targets = options.targets.map(function(e){ return new BrowsePathTarget(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.BrowsePathTarget (options)

  • description and source-code
    function BrowsePathTarget(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * The id of the target node.
      * @property targetId
      * @type {ExpandedNodeId}
      */
    self.targetId = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.targetId);

    /**
      * The index of the target in the relative path. UInt32.MaxValue if the entire path was processed.
      * @property remainingPathIndex
      * @type {UInt32}
      */
    self.remainingPathIndex = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.remainingPathIndex);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.RelativePath (options)

  • description and source-code
    function RelativePath(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property elements
      * @type {RelativePathElement[]}
      */
    self.elements = [];
    if (options.elements) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.elements));
        self.elements = options.elements.map(function(e){ return new RelativePathElement(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.RelativePathElement (options)

  • description and source-code
    function RelativePathElement(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * The type of reference to follow.
      * @property referenceTypeId
      * @type {NodeId}
      */
    self.referenceTypeId = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.referenceTypeId);

    /**
      * If TRUE the reverse reference is followed.
      * @property isInverse
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.isInverse = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.isInverse);

    /**
      * If TRUE then subtypes of the reference type are followed.
      * @property includeSubtypes
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.includeSubtypes = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.includeSubtypes);

    /**
      * The browse name of the target.
      * @property targetName
      * @type {QualifiedName}
      */
    self.targetName =  new QualifiedName( options.targetName);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIdsRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIdsRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      * The list of paths to translate.
      * @property browsePath
      * @type {BrowsePath[]}
      */
    self.browsePath = [];
    if (options.browsePath) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.browsePath));
        self.browsePath = options.browsePath.map(function(e){ return new BrowsePath(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIdsResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIdsResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      * The results for the translate operations.
      * @property results
      * @type {BrowsePathResult[]}
      */
    self.results = [];
    if (options.results) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.results));
        self.results = options.results.map(function(e){ return new BrowsePathResult(e); } );
    }

    /**
      * The diagnostics associated with the results.
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.makeRelativePath (str, addressSpace)

  • description and source-code
    function makeRelativePath(str, addressSpace) {


    var r ={
        elements:[]
    };

    while (str.length>0) {

        var matches = str.match(regRelativePath);
        if (!matches) {
            throw new Error("Malformed relative path  :'" + str +"'");
        }
        // console.log(mm);

        var referenceTypeId,includeSubtypes,isInverse;

        //
        // ------------ extract reference type
        //
        var refStr = matches[1];
        if (refStr === "/" ) {

            referenceTypeId= hierarchicalReferenceTypeNodeId;
            isInverse= false;
            includeSubtypes= true;
        }else if (refStr === "." ) {

            referenceTypeId= aggregatesReferenceTypeNodeId;
            isInverse= false;
            includeSubtypes= true;
        } else {

            // match  3 =>    "#" or null
            includeSubtypes = !(matches[3] === "#");

            // match  4 =>    "!" or null
            isInverse = (matches[4] === "!");

            // match 5
            // namespace match 6 ( ns:)
            // name      match 7
            var ns = matches[6] ? parseInt(matches[6]) :0;
            var name = matches[7];
            if ( !matches[6] ) {
                //xx console.log( mm[6])
                referenceTypeId = resolveNodeId(name);

            } else {
                // AddressSpace.prototype.findReferenceType = function (refType,namespace)
                referenceTypeId = addressSpace.findReferenceType(name,ns);
            }
            assert(referenceTypeId && !referenceTypeId.isEmpty());
        }

        r.elements.push({
            referenceTypeId: referenceTypeId,
            isInverse: isInverse,
            includeSubtypes: includeSubtypes,
            targetName: makeQualifiedName(matches)
        });

        str = str.substr(matches[0].length);
    }


    r = new RelativePath(r);
    //xx console.log(r.toString());
    return r;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.BrowsePathResult

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.BrowsePathResult (options)

    function BrowsePathResult(options)

    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */

    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * A code indicating any error during the operation.
      * @property statusCode
      * @type {StatusCode}
      */

    /**
      * A list of nodes found. The first element matches the type definition.
      * @property targets
      * @type {BrowsePathTarget[]}
      */
    self.targets = [];
    if (options.targets) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.targets));
        self.targets = options.targets.map(function(e){ return new BrowsePathTarget(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);

    this.targets = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new BrowsePathTarget();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.BrowsePathResult.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_StatusCode(this.statusCode,stream);
    encodeArray(this.targets,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

module node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.BrowsePathTarget

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.BrowsePathTarget (options)

  • description and source-code
    function BrowsePathTarget(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * The id of the target node.
      * @property targetId
      * @type {ExpandedNodeId}
      */
    self.targetId = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.targetId);

    /**
      * The index of the target in the relative path. UInt32.MaxValue if the entire path was processed.
      * @property remainingPathIndex
      * @type {UInt32}
      */
    self.remainingPathIndex = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.remainingPathIndex);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.RelativePath

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.RelativePath (options)

  • description and source-code
    function RelativePath(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property elements
      * @type {RelativePathElement[]}
      */
    self.elements = [];
    if (options.elements) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.elements));
        self.elements = options.elements.map(function(e){ return new RelativePathElement(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.elements = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new RelativePathElement();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}

module node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.RelativePathElement

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.RelativePathElement (options)

  • description and source-code
    function RelativePathElement(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      * The type of reference to follow.
      * @property referenceTypeId
      * @type {NodeId}
      */
    self.referenceTypeId = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.referenceTypeId);

    /**
      * If TRUE the reverse reference is followed.
      * @property isInverse
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.isInverse = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.isInverse);

    /**
      * If TRUE then subtypes of the reference type are followed.
      * @property includeSubtypes
      * @type {Boolean}
      */
    self.includeSubtypes = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.includeSubtypes);

    /**
      * The browse name of the target.
      * @property targetName
      * @type {QualifiedName}
      */
    self.targetName =  new QualifiedName( options.targetName);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.RelativePathElement.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.RelativePathElement.prototype

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.RelativePathElement.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.referenceTypeId = decode_NodeId(stream,options);
    this.isInverse = decode_Boolean(stream,options);
    this.includeSubtypes = decode_Boolean(stream,options);
    this.targetName.decode(stream,options);
}
  • example usage

    return;

    console.log(hexDump(data));

    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_NodeId(this.referenceTypeId,stream);
    encode_Boolean(this.isInverse,stream);
    encode_Boolean(this.includeSubtypes,stream);
   this.targetName.encode(stream,options);

module node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIdsRequest

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIdsRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIdsRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      * The list of paths to translate.
      * @property browsePath
      * @type {BrowsePath[]}
      */
    self.browsePath = [];
    if (options.browsePath) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.browsePath));
        self.browsePath = options.browsePath.map(function(e){ return new BrowsePath(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIdsRequest.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

    this.browsePath = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new BrowsePath();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}

module node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIdsResponse

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIdsResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIdsResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      * The results for the translate operations.
      * @property results
      * @type {BrowsePathResult[]}
      */
    self.results = [];
    if (options.results) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.results));
        self.results = options.results.map(function(e){ return new BrowsePathResult(e); } );
    }

    /**
      * The diagnostics associated with the results.
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIdsResponse.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function BaseUAObject() {

}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIdsResponse.prototype

function node-opcua.translate_browse_paths_to_node_ids_service.TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIdsResponse.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.responseHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.results = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new BrowsePathResult();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
    this.diagnosticInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}

    err.decode(stream);

    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

    encodeArray(this.diagnosticInfos,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });

module node-opcua.utils

function node-opcua.utils._DEPRECATED_RENAMED (oldName, newName)

  • description and source-code
    function _DEPRECATED_RENAMED(oldName, newName) {
    return function () {
        console.log(" WARNING : method ".yellow + oldName.cyan + " is deprecated and has been renamed as ".yellow + newName.cyan
);
        return this.constructor.prototype[newName].apply(this, arguments);
    };
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils._DEPRECATED_SOON_REMOVED (name, func, extra_info)

  • description and source-code
    function _DEPRECATED_SOON_REMOVED(name, func, extra_info) {
    extra_info = extra_info || "";
    return function () {
        console.log("~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~".red);
        console.log(" WARNING : method ".yellow + name.cyan + " is deprecated ".yellow);
        console.log(trace_from_this_projet_only(new Error()));
        console.log("          " + extra_info.yellow);
        console.log("~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~".red);
        return func.apply(this,arguments);
    };
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.buffer_ellipsis (buffer, start, end)

  • description and source-code
    function buffer_ellipsis(buffer, start, end) {
    start = start || 0;
    end = end || buffer.length;
    if (end - start < 40) {
        return buffer.slice(start, end).toString("hex");
    }
    return buffer.slice(start, start + 10).toString("hex") + " ... " +
        buffer.slice(end - 10, end).toString("hex");

}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.capitalizeFirstLetter (str)

  • description and source-code
    function capitalizeFirstLetter(str)  {
    return str.substr(0, 1).toUpperCase() + str.substr(1);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.checkDebugFlag (script_fullpath)

  • description and source-code
    function checkDebugFlag(script_fullpath) {

    var filename = path.basename(script_fullpath, ".js");
    var doDebug = debug_flags[filename] ? true : false;
    if (process.env.DEBUG && !debug_flags.hasOwnProperty(filename) ) {
        doDebug = process.env.DEBUG.indexOf(filename) >= 0 || process.env.DEBUG.indexOf("ALL") >= 0;
        setDebugFlag(filename,doDebug);
    }
    return doDebug;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.check_flag (value, mask)

  • description and source-code
    function check_flag(value, mask) {
    assert(mask !== undefined && mask.value);
    return ((value & mask.value) === mask.value);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.clone_buffer (buffer)

  • description and source-code
    function clone_buffer(buffer) {
    var clone = createFastUninitializedBuffer(buffer.length);
    buffer.copy(clone, 0, 0);
    return clone;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.compare_buffers (buf1, buf2, max_length)

  • description and source-code
    function compare_buffers(buf1, buf2, max_length) {

    max_length = max_length || buf2.length;
    var block_length = 80;
    var cursor = 0;
    while (cursor < max_length) {
        var slice1 = buf1.slice(cursor, cursor + block_length);
        var slice2 = buf2.slice(cursor, cursor + block_length);
        if (slice2.toString("hex") !== slice1.toString("hex")) {
            console.log("pos = ", cursor);
            console.log("slice1 :", buffer_ellipsis(slice1).yellow);
            console.log("slice2 :", buffer_ellipsis(slice2).blue);
        }
        cursor += block_length;
    }
    // xx buf1.length.should.equal(max_length);

}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.constructFilename (dir)

  • description and source-code
    constructFilename = function (dir) {

    var dirname = $_$.dirname;
    var file = path.join(dirname, dir);
    return file;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    console.log(trace_from_this_projet_only(err));

    function dump(obj) {
    console.log("\n", util.inspect(JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(obj)), {colors: true, depth: 10}));
}

  • description and source-code
    function dumpIf(condition, obj) {

    if (condition) {
        dump(obj);
    }
}

    function getObjectClassName(obj) {
    return Object.prototype.toString.call(obj).slice(8, -1);
}
  • example usage

function node-opcua.utils.getTempFilename (tmpfile)

  • description and source-code
    function getTempFilename(tmpfile) {
    tmpfile = tmpfile || "";
    return path.normalize(path.join(__dirname,'../../tmp/',tmpfile));

}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.get_clock_tick ()

  • description and source-code
    function get_clock_tick() {
    var hrt =  process.hrtime();
    var r =  (hrt[0]-tick_origin)*1000.0 +  Math.ceil(hrt[1]/1E6*1000)/1000;
    return r;
    // Date.now();
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.hexDump (buffer, width)

  • description and source-code
    function hexDump(buffer, width) {
    if (!buffer) {
        return "<>";
    }
    width = width || 32;
    var hexy = require("hexy");
    if (buffer.length > 1024) {

        return hexy.hexy(buffer.slice(0, 1024), {width: width, format: "twos"}) + "\n .... ( " + buffer.length + ")";
    } else {
        return hexy.hexy(buffer, {width: width, format: "twos"});
    }
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.isNullOrUndefined (value)

  • description and source-code
    function isNullOrUndefined(value)  {
    return ( value === undefined ) || (value === null);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.lowerFirstLetter (str)

  • description and source-code
    function lowerFirstLetter(str) {
    var result =  str.substr(0, 1).toLowerCase() + str.substr(1);
    if (result.length>3 && isUpperCaseChar(str[1]) && isUpperCaseChar(str[2])) {
        result =  str.substr(0, 2).toLowerCase() + str.substr(2);
    }
    return result;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.make_debugLog (script_fullpath)

  • description and source-code
    function make_debugLog(script_fullpath) {

    function w(str,l) {
        return (str+"                                    ").substr(0,l);
    }
    function file_line(filename,caller_line) {
        return (w(filename,30)+ ":" + w(caller_line,5)).bgWhite.cyan;
    }
    var doDebug = checkDebugFlag(script_fullpath);
    var filename = path.basename(script_fullpath, ".js");
    function debugLogFunc() {
        if (debug_flags[filename] ) {

            // caller line number
            var l = (new Error()).stack.split("\n")[2].split(":");
            var caller_line = l[l.length-2];
            var args = [].concat([file_line(filename,caller_line)]  ,_.values(arguments)           );
            console.log.apply(console, args);
        }
    }

    return debugLogFunc;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.makebuffer (listOfBytes)

  • description and source-code
    function makeBuffer(listOfBytes) {
    var l = listOfBytes.split(" ");
    var b = createFastUninitializedBuffer(l.length);
    var i = 0;
    l.forEach(function (value) {
        b.writeUInt8(parseInt(value, 16), i);
        i += 1;
    });
    return b;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.normalize_require_file (baseFolder, full_path_to_file)

  • description and source-code
    function normalize_require_file(baseFolder, full_path_to_file) {
    var local_file = path.relative(baseFolder, full_path_to_file).replace(/\\/g, "/");
    // append ./ if necessary
    if (local_file.substr(0, 1) !== ".") {
        local_file = "./" + local_file;
    }
    // remove extension
    local_file = local_file.substr(0, local_file.length - path.extname(local_file).length);

    return local_file;

}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.redirectToFile (tmpfile, action_func, callback)

  • description and source-code
    function redirectToFile(tmpfile, action_func, callback) {

    assert(_.isFunction(action_func));
    assert(!callback || _.isFunction(callback));

    var is_async = action_func && action_func.length;

    var log_file = getTempFilename(tmpfile);

    var f = fs.createWriteStream(log_file, {flags: 'w', encoding: "ascii"});

    function _write_to_file(d) { //

        var msg = util.format.apply(null, arguments);
        f.write(msg + '\n');
        if (process.env.DEBUG) {
            old_console_log.call(this, msg);
        }
    }

    f.on('finish', function () {
        //xx console.log("done");
        //xx console.log(fs.readFileSync(log_file,"ascii"));
        if (callback) {
            callback();
        }
    });

    if (!is_async) {

        var old_console_log = console.log;

        console.log = _write_to_file;

        // async version
        try{
            action_func();
        }
        catch(err){
            console.log = old_console_log;

            console.log("redirectToFile  has intercepted an error");
            // we don't want the callback anymore since we got an error
            callback = function() {
                // display file on screen  for insvestigation
                console.log(fs.readFileSync(log_file).toString("ascii"));
                // rethrow exception
                throw err;
            };
            f.end();

        }
        console.log = old_console_log;

        f.end();

    } else {

        old_console_log = console.log;
        console.log = _write_to_file;

        // async version
        action_func(function (err) {

            assert(callback);
            f.end();
            console.log = old_console_log;
            console.log("err = ",err);
        });


    }


//    f.write("", callback);
    // f.close();
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.replaceBufferWithHexDump (obj)

  • description and source-code
    function replaceBufferWithHexDump(obj) {
    for (var p in obj) {
        if (obj.hasOwnProperty(p)) {
            if (obj[p] instanceof Buffer) {
                obj[p] = "<BUFFER>" + obj[p].toString("hex") + "</BUFFER>";
            } else if (typeof obj[p] === "object") {
                replaceBufferWithHexDump(obj[p]);
            }
        }
    }
    return obj;
}
  • example usage
    ...
case 'gep':
case 'getEndpoints':
    apply_command(cmd,function(callback){
        client.getEndpointsRequest(function (err, endpoints) {
            if (err) {
                log(err.message);
            }
            endpoints = utils.replaceBufferWithHexDump(endpoints);
            log(treeify.asTree(endpoints, true));
            callback(err);
        });
    });
    break;

case 'createSession':
...

function node-opcua.utils.setDebugFlag (script_fullpath, flag)

  • description and source-code
    function setDebugFlag(script_fullpath, flag) {
    var filename = path.basename(script_fullpath, ".js");
    if (process.env.DEBUG) {
        var decorated_filename = w(filename,30).yellow;
        console.log(" Setting debug for ",decorated_filename, " to ", flag.toString()[flag ? "cyan" : "red"]);
    }
    debug_flags[filename] = flag;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.set_flag (value, mask)

  • description and source-code
    function set_flag(value, mask) {
    assert(mask !== undefined);
    return (value | mask.value);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.toHex (i, nb)

  • description and source-code
    function toHex(i, nb) {
    return ("000000000000000" + i.toString(16)).substr(-nb);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.utils.trace_from_this_projet_only (err)

  • description and source-code
    function trace_from_this_projet_only(err) {

    var str = [];
    str.push(" display_trace_from_this_project_only = ".cyan.bold);
    if (err) {
        str.push(err.message);
    }
    err = err || new Error();
    var stack = err.stack;
    if (stack) {
        stack = (stack.split("\n").filter(function (el) {
            return el.match(/node-opcua/) && !el.match(/node_modules/);
        }));
        //xx stack.shift();
        str.push(stack.join("\n").yellow);
    } else {
        str.push(" NO STACK TO TRACE !!!!".red);
    }
    return str.join("\n");
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module node-opcua.write_service

function node-opcua.write_service.WriteRequest (options)

  • description and source-code
    function WriteRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */
    self.requestHeader =  new RequestHeader( options.requestHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property nodesToWrite
      * @type {WriteValue[]}
      */
    self.nodesToWrite = [];
    if (options.nodesToWrite) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.nodesToWrite));
        self.nodesToWrite = options.nodesToWrite.map(function(e){ return new WriteValue(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.write_service.WriteResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function WriteResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {StatusCode[]}
      */
    self.results = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[1], options.results);

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */
    self.diagnosticInfos = [];
    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function node-opcua.write_service.WriteValue (options)

  • description and source-code
    function WriteValue(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property nodeId
      * @type {NodeId}
      */
    self.nodeId = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.nodeId);

    /**
      *
      * @property attributeId
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.attributeId = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.attributeId);

    /**
      *
      * @property indexRange
      * @type {NumericRange}
      */
    self.indexRange = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.indexRange);

    /**
      *
      * @property value
      * @type {DataValue}
      */
    self.value =  new DataValue( options.value);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);

    function WriteRequest(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

      *
      * @property requestHeader
      * @type {RequestHeader}
      */

      *
      * @property nodesToWrite
      * @type {WriteValue[]}
      */

    if (options.nodesToWrite) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.nodesToWrite));

module node-opcua.write_service.WriteRequest.prototype

function node-opcua.write_service.WriteRequest.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.requestHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.nodesToWrite = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new WriteValue();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}
  • example usage
    ...
    return;
}
var messageHeader = readMessageHeader(stream);

if (messageHeader.msgType === "ERR") {

    var err = new s.TCPErrorMessage();
    err.decode(stream);
    console.log(" Error 0x" + err.statusCode.toString() + " reason:" + err.reason);
    console.log(hexDump(data));
}

function node-opcua.write_service.WriteRequest.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.nodesToWrite,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
}
  • example usage
    ...
 * @method encode
 *
 * @param stream {BinaryStream}
 */
ActivateSessionRequest.prototype.encode = function(stream,options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
};

function node-opcua.write_service.WriteResponse (options)

  • description and source-code
    function WriteResponse(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property responseHeader
      * @type {ResponseHeader}
      */
    self.responseHeader =  new ResponseHeader( options.responseHeader);

    /**
      *
      * @property results
      * @type {StatusCode[]}
      */
    self.results = initialize_field_array(schema.fields[1], options.results);

    /**
      *
      * @property diagnosticInfos
      * @type {DiagnosticInfo[]}
      */

    if (options.diagnosticInfos) {
        assert(_.isArray(options.diagnosticInfos));
        self.diagnosticInfos = options.diagnosticInfos.map(function(e){ return new DiagnosticInfo(e); } );
    }

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);

function node-opcua.write_service.WriteResponse.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.responseHeader.decode(stream,options);
    this.results = decodeArray(stream, decode_StatusCode);
    this.diagnosticInfos = decodeArray(stream, function(stream) {
       var obj = new DiagnosticInfo();
       obj.decode(stream,options);
       return obj;
    });
}

module node-opcua.write_service.WriteValue

function node-opcua.write_service.WriteValue (options)

  • description and source-code
    function WriteValue(options)
{
    options = options || {};
    /* istanbul ignore next */
    if (schema_helpers.doDebug) { check_options_correctness_against_schema(this,schema,options); }
    var self = this;
    assert(this instanceof BaseUAObject); //  ' keyword "new" is required for constructor call')
    resolve_schema_field_types(schema);

    BaseUAObject.call(this,options);

    /**
      *
      * @property nodeId
      * @type {NodeId}
      */
    self.nodeId = initialize_field(schema.fields[0], options.nodeId);

    /**
      *
      * @property attributeId
      * @type {IntegerId}
      */
    self.attributeId = initialize_field(schema.fields[1], options.attributeId);

    /**
      *
      * @property indexRange
      * @type {NumericRange}
      */
    self.indexRange = initialize_field(schema.fields[2], options.indexRange);

    /**
      *
      * @property value
      * @type {DataValue}
      */
    self.value =  new DataValue( options.value);

   // Object.preventExtensions(self);
}

module node-opcua.write_service.WriteValue.prototype

function node-opcua.write_service.WriteValue.prototype.decode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    decode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.decode.call(this,stream,options);
    this.nodeId = decode_NodeId(stream,options);
    this.attributeId = decode_IntegerId(stream,options);
    this.indexRange = decode_NumericRange(stream,options);
    this.value.decode(stream,options);
}

function node-opcua.write_service.WriteValue.prototype.encode (stream, options)

  • description and source-code
    encode = function (stream, options) {
    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
    encode_NodeId(this.nodeId,stream);
    encode_IntegerId(this.attributeId,stream);
    encode_NumericRange(this.indexRange,stream);
   this.value.encode(stream,options);
}
  • example usage

 * @method encode

 * @param stream {BinaryStream}

    // call base class implementation first
    BaseUAObject.prototype.encode.call(this,stream,options);
   this.requestHeader.encode(stream,options);
   this.clientSignature.encode(stream,options);
    encodeArray(this.clientSoftwareCertificates,stream,function(obj,stream){ obj.encode(stream,options); });
    encodeArray(this.localeIds, stream, encode_LocaleId);
    encode_ExtensionObject(this.userIdentityToken,stream);
   this.userTokenSignature.encode(stream,options);
